Facts.LossMemo: *REQUIRES REVIEW* FLAGGED FOR TOTAL LOSS , ACV REQUIRED INSURED IS DRIVING VEHICLE DAMAGE IS CONSISTENT WITH COLLISION NEW DAMAGE TO BACK END , REAR BUMPER DEDUCTIBLE WAIVED AS PER ASSIGNMENT ROADSIDE +

DamageLineInfo.LineDesc: SPIDER CRACKING , ATTEMPT REPAIR MAY REQUIRE REPLACE

VehicleDamageEstimateAddRq.CustomMemo: *************************************** IMPORTANT NOTICE TO CUSTOMER ************************************************* *********************************** Repairs should be completed as soon as possible. ****************************************** ********************************* If not completed within 2 years from the Date of Loss, ***************************************** **************************** you may lose your legal right to require ICBC to pay for the repair. ******************************** ************************* Not all repair facilities have a direct billing relationship with ICBC. ********************************** ****************** ICBC recommends you contact the local ICBC Claims Office before commencing repairs, ***************** ******************** if the repair facility you choose is not an ICBC Collision Repair Network Facility. *************************

OtherMemos.OtherMemo: *************************************** IMPORTANT NOTICE TO CUSTOMER ************************************************* *********************************** Repairs should be completed as soon as possible. ****************************************** ********************************* If not completed within 2 years from the Date of Loss, ***************************************** **************************** you may lose your legal right to require ICBC to pay for the repair. ******************************** ************************* Not all repair facilities have a direct billing relationship with ICBC. ********************************** ****************** ICBC recommends you contact the local ICBC Claims Office before commencing repairs, ***************** ******************** if the repair facility you choose is not an ICBC Collision Repair Network Facility. *************************

CERTIFICATE OF REPAIR:
***COLLISION REPAIR PROGRAM RATES APPLY TO ICBC REPAIR NETWORK FACILITIES ONLY***
FACILITY INFORMATION:
NAME: ______________________________ICBC FACILITY#:_______________________ GST#: _______________________________ICBC ACCOUNT#: _____________________
EMPLOYEE NAME: _________________________________________________________
I certify this estimate is submitted as an invoice for payment by ICBC at the ICBC rates which apply to this facility. I also certify this estimate complies with applicable policies and procedures outlined in ICBCs Material Damage Claims Procedures and Collision Repair Program Guide and all parts and services have been supplied to the customer. I further certify the customers portion has been collected in full as outlined in this estimate.
I understand it is a breach of contract and an offence under the Insurance (Vehicle) Act to provide false or misleading information to ICBC about this repair.
SIGNATURE: ____________________________________
POSITION: ______________________________________
INFORMATION FOR CUSTOMER:
If you choose not to use an ICBC Repair Network facility, you will have to pay the repair facility directly and submit your bill to ICBC for reimbursement upon completion of repairs. Once ICBC has confirmed the work described on this estimate has been completed you will receive reimbursement for the ICBC approved repair/replacement amount less your deductible and/or depreciation.
CUSTOMER'S STATEMENT:
I, __________________________________, the registered owner (or their representative) of the above described vehicle which was damaged in an accident on or about the ____ day of _________, 20___, state that the above vehicle appears to have been repaired satisfactorily.
SIGNATURE:____________________________________________
DATE:__________________________________________________
